extendedInfo.description: Join millions of other users on YouMail Visual Voicemail Plus!  YouMail is more powerful and more fun than any other Android visual voicemail.  And it's FREE!KEY FEATURES- Scroll and play voice messages on any device: Android phone, Android tablet, computer, or e-mail account.- Visual caller ID: see caller photos, name, and city and state, even when they're not in your address book - whether they left a message or just hung up.- Smart greetings: wow callers, automatically greeting them by name, or with a pre-recorded greeting from the YouMail greetings community. - Caller ditching: unwanted callers are sent to voicemail automatically, where they hear "this number is out of service" and can't leave a message!- Total ownership: easily save important messages forever, neatly organized in folders, and share them on twitter or facebook.- Easy contact backup and sync with facebook: access your contacts on any device.- High Quality Human-edited voicemail to text transcription: save time by simply reading your voicemail within the app or by e-mail, without ever having to listen to it. Premium Read-It Plan required.NOTES- Major US Carriers supported (including AT&T, Verizon, T-Mobile, Sprint). Sorry, doesn't work with pre-paid plans, such as T-mobile Flex-Pay, Simple Mobile, Family Mobile, and Virgin Mobile, and for most Metro PCS and Cricket users.- Requires you to forward your unanswered calls to YouMail.  To return to your old voicemail at any time, use "menu", "preferences", "accounts", and "forward to carrier" (or simply "google" cancel YouMail for instructions).- It's possible for carriers to drop your call forwarding.  To reactivate YouMail, just use "menu", "preferences", "accounts", and "forward to YouMail".- It's possible for carriers to fail to forward your calls to YouMail correctly (where YouMail won't find your mailbox or will ask for callers to enter the mailbox number).  In that case, please contact support@youmail.com and we will try to give you another access number that may not have the problem.  But it may be you live in an area where you're out of luck and would have to buy YouMail Pro to solve the problem.- High Quality Human edited voicemail-to-text transcription requires a subscription, but YouMail Visual Voicemail Plus is still free to use if you do not buy a transcription plan. - By using YouMail you agree to the YouMail terms of service: http://www.youmail.com/termsofuse.html-Customer Support Please email us at AndroidHelp@YouMail.com or go within the App, tap on Menu, and tap on Help. Leaving negative reviews with vague comments will not help us fix the app. We listen to our users, what's wrong, and fix all that we can with every new release. Help us help you! Email us at AndroidHelp@YouMail.com

reviews.title: Great free visual voicemail!
reviews.comment: Really awesome! I actually listen to my voicemail now. I wish the voice to text was free though
reviews.author: Allie Cass-Wilson

reviews.title: Visual voicemail is a must have!
reviews.comment: Ran across this after trying stock visual voicemail. Great app with lots of customization, even in the free version. Download this immediately.
reviews.author: Victor Allen

reviews.title: Great service so far!
reviews.comment: I have no complaints yet :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tops in my book
reviews.comment: Excellent voice mail app that allows you to save messages right to you sd card.

reviews.title: No problems here
reviews.comment: Works better than Tmobiles visual voicemail.

reviews.title: This is the Coolest App!!!
reviews.comment: I really like the different stuff it does.
reviews.author: Troni Hutless

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Should translate to Spanish or English or Chinese or hope to listen to the intended recipient or any questions about the same time space continuum eternal voices.
reviews.author: David Fuentes

reviews.title: The best voicemail service I have ever had!
reviews.comment: Really love being able to set up different voicemail greetings for different people or even able to set up a greeting that makes people think your number is disconnected. Awesome, awesome, awesome.
reviews.author: Ron Schnese

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Keep it up guys!
reviews.author: Olaoluwa Abe

reviews.title: YouMail Visual
reviews.comment: YouMail is a great tool to personalize your cell phone voice mail. My callers and friends all enjoy it. When calling me and not getting an answer. If it can not get any better then leave it as it is. If it is not broken than don\'t try to fix it. Once again I love it.
reviews.author: Saint Dobie

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Easy to use. After trying others and being frustrated with Verizon\'s, I downloaded this and never looked back. I bundle it with my phone icon and never miss a message. Love the block and ditch features for those pesky telemarketers too. And messages are crystal clear and easy to view.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New phone switch not eek
reviews.comment: HTC One is my fone and I\'m with tmobile. Called and had them set it up so it was all good on there end yet still void get the test call to ark.  I had previously used youmail with no probe on two different my touch q devices and now to find out when I need help you don\'t provide teck support for free accounts over the fine! I am a bit tucked of about that! I am choosing to go without youmail until uguys can fix this problem
reviews.author: Makayl Lercher

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Love it! Best app that I have used. Had others but this app does what it says it can and will do.

reviews.comment: The ditch is to sensitive but I love the other features

reviews.title: Updated Review
reviews.comment: This latest update has fixed problems I was having with a previous version. I really like being able to block unwanted callers and callers with blocked ID.

reviews.title: Looked good.
reviews.comment: Didn\'t answer test call on set up and crash closed 10 times in the first 15 minutes of use. Too bad; it looks like it would be great. Galaxy Note 2

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: STOP MAKING US LOGIN AFTER EACH UPDATE, idiots. And SMOKE YOU for uploading my contacts IN-APP WITHOUT ASKING! And stop asking. Also, the Whats New for this and the previous 2 updates hasnt changed - WHAT DID U DO?

reviews.title: Great, Great, Great
